description:
Create a new organization owned by the request's user.  To create
an organization only the name is required.

parameters.description: the human readable name for the new organization.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: the unique URL slug for this organization.  If this is not provided a slug is automatically generated based on the name.
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: a boolean signaling you agree to the applicable terms of service and privacy policy.
parameters.name: agreeTerms

title: Create a New Organization
